task.title: Viewing Archived Items and Groups
task.shortdesc: A board can be archived and looked at for future reference. These boards will disappear when archived, and can only be found in the Arcbived Tab afterwards. Indivuals items or whole boards are also able to be archived, depnding on what needs to be saved.

step.cmd: From a Boards page, select the three dots icon at the top right of the board page
A dropdown will appear, select "Archived Tasks/Groups"
The Archived Tasks/Groups Page will now apear, with viewing for any archived items
